text.末脚が武器とかさ、\r\n今まで言われたことなかったよ。\r\n…気づいたの、ア: No one ever told me that last leg \nacceleration is my weapon. \n… You were the only one who noticed.
text.アンタが親になったら、\r\n子どもに鬱陶しがられるだろうな…\r\n熱血でおせ: If you were a parent, your children \nwould be annoyed… you're hot- \nheaded, nosy, and worry warts.
text.アンタも水族館の魚みたく、\r\nずーっと大人しかったらいいのに。\r\n…ま、: I wish you were always quiet like the \nfish in the aquarium. Well, if you are \nlike that It won't be you.
text.なんつーか、\r\n年あけても変わんないね、アンタ。\r\n…ま、ヨロシク。:
How should I say it, 
… Even after a year you still didn't 
change, didn't you. Well, I will be in 
your care.
text.友チョコとかめんど…\r\nん？何見てんの？\r\nアンタも欲しいとか言わないよ:
Friendship choco is such a pain… 
Huh? Why are you looking at me like 
that? You're not going to say you 
want one, are you?
text.あー………チョコは後で渡すから。\r\n何って？バレンタインの。\r\nお世話に: Umm…… I'll give you the chocolate \nlater. Why? For Valentine's Day. \nI've been in your care, just in case.
text.短冊か…自分の願いくらい、\r\n自分で叶えるっての。\r\nま、書くのは自由だ: Tanzaku huh… If it's my own wish, \nI will make it come true myslef. \nWell, you are free to write.
text.ハロウィンのお菓子、\r\n買っとかなきゃな…どうせ\r\nうっさいヤツらが来る: I'll have to buy some Halloween \ncandy… I'm sure the annoying people \nwill come.
text.サンタに願いごと…？\r\nいや、もうそういう年じゃないし。\r\nガキ扱いしな: Wishing for Santa…? No, I'm not at \nthat age anymore. I wish you won't \ntreat me like a child.
text.騒がしいのがイヤなだけで、\r\nクリスマスは嫌いじゃないよ。\r\n…イルミネ: I don't mind Christmas, I just don't \nlike the noise. .…and the illumination \nare beautiful.
text.帰省組がいないから\r\nコースが空いてて助かるよ。\r\n今のうちに目一杯走っ:
Thank goodness there are no 
returning teams, so the course will 
be free. I'll run as fast as I can while 
I can…!
text.アンタ、誕生日なんだ。\r\n…あ、お祝いとか\r\nアタシに期待しないでよ？: It's your birthday huh. \nDon't expect me to celebrate, okay?
text.誕生日おめでと…って、何その顔。\r\nバカっぽい…\r\nふふっ、ホントうける: Happy birthday… what's with that \nface? You look like an idiot… \nFufu, that look hilarious.
text.え、アタシの誕生日？\r\n…そんなことまでよく覚えてるね。: Oh, it's my birthday? How can you \neven remember such a thing?
text.誕生日？…ああ、うん。どうも。\r\n………何？人に祝われるのとか、\r\n慣れ: Birthday? Uh… yeah. Thanks. \n………What? I'm not used to people \ncelebrating my birthday.
text.アンタにお知らせだって。\r\n見といたら？: There is an announcement for you. \nWhy don't you check it out?
text.アンタ宛に\r\nプレゼントがあるみたいだけど。: It look like there is a present for you.
text.ミッションクリアだってさ。\r\n報酬あるかも。: It look like you clear the mission. \nThere might be a reward.
text.もうすぐイベントがあるんだって。\r\nよく知らないけど。: they said there will be an event soon. \nNot that I know anything about it.
text.イベント開催してるのか…。\r\nどうりで騒がしいと思った。: They are holding an event huh… \nNo wonder it was so noisy.
text.くそっ…脚…\r\nなんでこんな、重いんだ…。: Damn… legs… \nwhy are they so, so heavy…
text.だから…疲れてないっての…！\r\nてか、こんくらいで\r\nへばってらんないじ: I'm not tired. I mean, I'm not going to \nlet something like this get me down…
text.ん。準備できてる。\r\nさっさとやろうよ、トレーナー。: Hmm. I'm ready. Let's get on with it, \ntrainer.
text.調子、イイんじゃない？\r\nアタシにしては、ね。: You're doing well, aren't you? \nFor me, you know.
text.とにかくやるしかないってのは、\r\nわかってるし。\r\nアタシに足りないとこ: Anyway I know what I have to do. \nSo tell me what I'm missing.
text.早くメニューちょうだい。\r\n他のヤツらより量こなして、\r\n強くなってやる: Give me the menu soon. \nI'm going to do more than the others \nand become stronger!
text.…で？\r\nいつも通りやってく感じ？: … so? \nSo it's going to be business as usual?
text.何からやんの？\r\nメニュー、考えてあるんでしょ？: Where do we start? \nYou have a menu in mind, don't you?
text.一応、やってみるけど。\r\nあんま期待しないでよね。: Just in case, I'll give it a shot. \nDon't get your hopes up.
text.イマイチ気分乗んないけど…\r\nトレーニングはするから。: I'm not in the mood for it… \nbut I'll do the training.
text.…こんな気持ちで練習して、\r\n身になんのかな。: I wonder if I'll remember anything if \nI practice in this condition.
text.…あ～っ、くそ。\r\nくすぶってる場合じゃ、\r\nないってのに…。: Ahhhh, damn. \nI don't have time for this smothering…
text.またレース…ううん。\r\nちゃんと出られる。\r\n休憩とれば、きっと…ヘーキ: Another race… no. \nI'm sure I can make it. \nIf I take a break, I'm sure… I'll be fine.
text.うん…もっとレースに出て、\r\n勝たなきゃなんないし…。グダグダ\r\n言って: Yeah… I need to race more \nand win more races… \nI can't complain about it… haah.
text.ふふっ、悪くないじゃん。\r\n今なら、どんなデカいヤツにも\r\n負ける気しな: Fufu, Not bad isn't it? Right now I \ndon't think I will lose to any big guy.
text.調整は完璧だし、\r\nあとは仕掛けるタイミング――\r\n…この末脚で絶対1着:
My feeling is perfect, 
I just need to find the right time to get 
going… and I'm going to get the first 
place with this last leg.
text.観客全員の度肝を抜いて、\r\nアタシの走りを\r\n目に焼きつけてやる…！: I'm going to suprise the audience, \nand I will burn my run into their eyes.
text.ねえ、出走まだ？\r\n今の感覚、逃したくないんだけど。: Hey, when are we going to run? \nI don't want to miss the feeling now.
text.この調子なら今回のレース、\r\n期待しても………あー、\r\nなんでもない。忘: With this condition, you can look \nforward to this race \n.……… Uh, it's nothing. Forget it.
text.っし、準備完了…ってニヤケすぎ。\r\n確かに調整、いい感じだったけど。\r\n:
Yes, my preparation is complete… 
you are grinning too much. Sure, my 
condtion is good, but… You don't get 
carried away until you win, right?
text.ほら、行くよ。\r\nアタシの名前を\r\n観客全員に刻みつけてやるんだ。: hey, let's go. \nI'm going to etch my name on every \nsingle person in the audience.
text.どんなレースでもやることは同じ。\r\n全員、アタシがブチ抜いてやる…！: No matter what the race, what I do is \nthe same. I'm going to beat them all…!
text.調子？まあまあかな。\r\nあとは練習通りにいければ…。: Condition? I guess so-so. Now if \nI can just do it like the practice…
text.もう本番？\r\nもっと調整したかったけど…\r\nしょうがないか。: Are we in the real thing already? \nI wanted to make more adjustments, \nbut… what can I do?
text.もう後には引けないし、\r\n今の状態でも\r\nやるだけやってやる…！: I can't back out now, \nI'll do whatever I have to do, even in \nthis condition!
text.心残りはあるけど、\r\nグダグダ言ってもしょうがないし。\r\n結果出せばそれ: I have regrets, but there's no point in \ndwelling on it. As long as we get \nresults, that's all that matters, right?
text.調整サイアクでも、\r\n絶対勝ってやる…！\r\n言い訳なんかしたくないし。: Even if the adjustments are terrible, \nI'm going to win. I don't want to make \nexcuses.
text.調整の結果で順位が決まるワケじゃ\r\nないし。本番になんなきゃ\r\nわかんな: The result is not determinde by your \ncondition. You won't know until the \nactual competition.
text.調整ボロボロだけど、もう知るか。\r\nどんな状況でも、アタシは\r\n勝たなき: My condition is in shambles, I don't \ncare anymore. No matter what the \nsituation, I have to win…!
text.そこそこ力ついたし、\r\n一応、礼は言っとく。: I've gained some strength, and I'd \nlike to thank you in advance.
text.もっといけると思ったけど…\r\nま、こんなもんか。: I thought it could be better, but… \nwell, it's not like this.
text.ああもう！\r\n次は絶対、1着とってやる…！: Ahhhh! \nNext time, I'll definitely take the first \nplace…!
text.まだまだ…もっと上に行くんだ…！: We're not done yet… We're going to \ngo higher…!
text.悪くないけど…\r\n半端な強さじゃ意味ないし。: Not bad… \nbut half-assed strength doesn't mean \nanything.
text.くそっ…！\r\nこんなんじゃダメなのに…！: Damn…! \nThis isn't how it's supposed to be…!
text.ライブか…レースに勝ったら、\r\nそれで満足なんだけどな。: Live huh… even though I'm already \nsattisfied with just winning the race.
text.すぅ、はぁ………っし！\r\nやってやる…！: Fuuu, haaa…… Okay! Let's do it…!
text.アンタって、出会った頃から\r\n暑苦しかったよね…。\r\nそのテンション疲れ: You've been a hot headed ever \nsince we met. Don't you get tired \nwith that tension?
text.はぁ…今日こそ他人のいないコース\r\n走れるって思ったのに。早起きな\r\nト:
Haaa… I thought today would be 
the day I would be able to run on a 
course without other people. Too 
many early riser training idiots…
text.…レース、朝イチでやんないかな。\r\n身長は朝のほうが高いって言うし。: …I wonder if we'll do the race, first \nthing in the morning. They say height \nis higher in the morning.
text.どいつもこいつも、何であんな\r\n昼食いっぱい食べられるの？\r\nマネしたら: How can they all eat so much for \nlunch? If I did, I won't be able to \nmove.
text.ふぁ…昼寝しようかな。チケットに\r\n見つかってない場所どこだっけ…\r\nて:
Huh… I think I'll take a nap. I wonder 
If there is place where Ticket won't 
find me… In the first place, how did 
she always find me?
text.まだまだ帰んないよ。\r\n今日のノルマ達成してないし。\r\nもっと鍛えないと: I'm not going home yet. I haven't \nreached my quota for today. \nI need to train more…!
text.寝ないと背が伸びないらしいけど、\r\nトレーニングもあるし…。\r\nあーもー:
I heard that if I don't sleep, I won't 
grow taller, but I still have training to 
do… Ahhhh, there's just not enough 
time.
text.暖かくなってきたし、\r\n屋上で昼寝でもしようかな…。: It's getting warmer, maybe I'll take a \nnap on the rooftop…
text.あーもー、ただでさえ暑いのに、\r\nチケットが騒がしいから\r\n余計に暑苦し: Ahhhh mou, Even though it's already \nhot, but Tickets are so noisy that it \nmakes it even hotter…
text.…久々にやろうかな、落ち葉焚き。\r\nゆらゆら燃える炎とか、木が爆ぜる\r\n:
…It's been a while since I've done a 
fallen leaf bonfire. I like the flickering 
flames and the sound of wood 
burning… I quite like it.
text.冬はのんびり1人鍋に限るね。\r\nあったまるし、後片付けも楽だし。\r\n…何:
In winter, I think it's best to relax and 
have a one-person hot pot. It's warm 
and easy to clean up afterwards. 
… What, I won't call you, okay?
text.チケットが揺さぶってきて、\r\n『タイシンテストー！』だって…。\r\nアタシ: Ticket shook me up and say, \n"Taishintesto!" I'm not a building.
text.スマホゲーのランク見られたとき、\r\nやけに驚かれたんだけど…。\r\n長くや:
People are surprised when they look 
at my rank in mobile game…… 
I mean, It's normal if you've been 
playing for a long time, right?
text.ラジオ聴いてたら、なんとなく\r\nリクエストした曲が流されてさ。\r\n…いや: I was listening to the radio, and \nthey were playing a song that I had \nrequested. …Well, that's all.
text.買い物全部通販でできるように早く\r\nならないかな…人ごみウザいし、\r\n店:
I can't wait to be able to do all my 
shopping by mail order… I hate 
crowds and I don't have to talk to 
store clerks…
text.服の染み抜きしてたらクリークさん\r\nやたら褒めてきてさ…自分の事は\r\n自: When I was removing stains from my \nclothes, Creek-san started praising \nme a lot… I just want to take care of my own things.
text.ウイニングライブ、ね…レースで\r\n勝った子を歌って踊らせようなんて\r\n誰: Winning live, you know… who would \nhave thought of making the winner of \na race sing and dance, seriously.
text.はぁ、お揃いの衣装ってなると\r\nやっぱ体格の違いが…\r\n…なんでもない、: Haaaa, If we are using matching \noutfit the height difference is… \n………nothing, forget it.
text.フード、いいじゃん。ウザい目線\r\n消してレースに集中できるし…\r\nゴール:
I like the hood. It takes away the 
annoying stares and lets me 
concentrate on the race… and when 
I get to the finish line and take it off, 
I see a different scenery.
text.そういや、気づいたら\r\nアシメの服けっこう持ってるな…。\r\n…たまたまだ: Well, I noticed that I have a lot of \nasymmetrical clothes… …I think it's \njust a coincidence.
text.寮に弁当忘れた…戻るのめんど…。\r\nでも最近、スイーツフェアとかで\r\nカ:
I forgot my lunch box at the dormitory 
……it's such a pain to go back… 
But the cafeteria has been crowded 
lately with all the sweets fairs and 
stuff… haaa.
text.昼休みに図書室行ったら『名著だ』\r\nとかってハヤヒデがやたら分厚い本\r\n:
I went to the library during lunch 
break and Hayahide recommended a 
very thick book, saying it was a great 
book… I ran away.
text.あ、あのゲームのイベント今日まで\r\nだった…って、別にいっか。\r\nヒマ潰: Oh, the event of that game ends \ntoday… well whatever. I'm just \nplaying it to kill time…
text.ったく、新入生のオリエンくらい\r\nちゃんとやってよ…。\r\nなんでアタシが:
You should at least do a proper 
orientation for new students… 
Why do I have to be the one to guide 
them…?
text.どっか空いてそうな\r\n海岸行こうかな…。\r\nイソギンチャクとか見たい…。: I'm thinking of going to some empty \nbeach… I want to see sea anemones \nand stuff…
text.公園で見かけた珍しい鳥…\r\nアレ、渡り鳥だったのかな…？\r\n…いいな、遠: A rare bird I saw in the park… \nI wonder if it was a migratory bird…? \nIt's nice to be able to fly so far away.
text.この学園、冬は何かと行事で\r\n騒がしいんだよね…はぁ、大雪とか\r\n降れば:
This school is so noisy in the winter 
with all the events… haah. I wonder 
if it will be quiet If it snows a lot 
… I guess not.
text.今日もアタシは\r\n普段通りで行くから。: I'm going to go as usual today.
text.なんでもいいけど、\r\n手は抜かないでね。: Whatever you do, don't cut corners.
text.もう、準備できてるけど。\r\nどうすんの？: My preparation is complete. \nWhat are we going to do?
text.とっとと底上げして、\r\n追いつかないと…！: We need to get to the bottom of this \nand catch up…!
text.ほら、早くやるよ。\r\n時間もったいないし。: Come on, let's do it quickly. \nIt's a waste of time.
text.まあ…アンタは、トレーナーだし。\r\n指示には従うよ。: Well… you're my trainer. \nI'll follow your instructions.
text.アンタの教え方は…\r\nまあまあ、かな。\r\n暑っ苦しくてウザいけど！: Your teaching style is… okay, I guess. \nIt's Hot and annoying, though!
text.アンタと組めたのは…まあ、アリだったかな。: Parter up with you… well, I guess \nit's fine.
text.うん。結果は残せたんじゃない？: Yes. I think we got the result, \ndidn't we?
text.まだまだ…もっと、キレに磨きを…！: Not ye… I still need to refine my \nsharpness…!
text.壁なんて、ブチ抜いてやる…！: No matter what obstacle, I will tear \nit down!
text.ナリタタイシン。\r\nナメたら蹴っ飛ばす。: Narita Taishin. \nI will kick you if you look down on me.
text.どいつもこいつもバカにすんな！\r\nアタシは走るし、勝ってみせる！: Everyone keep making fun of me! \nI will run, and I will show them \nI can win!
text.デカいヤツらには負けない。: I won't lose to any big guy.
text.ガキ扱いしないで。: Don't treat me like a kid.
text.体が熱い…なんだろこの感じ。: My body is hot… what is this feeling?
text.やるんだ？…あ、そ。: You're going to do it? …Oh, yeah.
text.意外。\r\nこういうの得意なんだ。: Surprising. \nYou are good at this kind of thing.
text.まあ、普通はこんなもんでしょ。: Well, this is how it usually is.
text.別に…期待とかしてなかったし。: It's not like have any expectations or \nanything.
text.誰にも邪魔させない…！: I won't let anyone get in my way…!
text.速く、速く…！誰よりも速く！\r\n甘く見て、あとでほえ面かかないでよね。\r\:
Faster, faster…! Faster than anyone 
else! Don't underestimate me, I won't 
let you laugh. I'll show you what I'm 
look like when i'm serious!
text.ふん！アタシの実力、思い知ったか！: Huh! Did you see my true strength!?
text.へへっ…見たかっての！: Heh heh… That's what I'm talking \nabout!
text.ふーん、明日はコレみたい。: Hmmm, it looks like this one is for \ntomorrow.
text.なに、トレーニングすんの？: What, are we going to train?
text.レースにエントリーすんの？\r\n…そう。: Are you entering the race? …I see.
text.ウマ娘名鑑、\r\nレベルアップしたってさ。: horsegirl's name book, \nit look like it leveled up.
text.馴れ合うわけじゃないから。: It's not like we're used with each \nother.
text.…来ないなら置いてくから。: …If you don't come, I'll leave you.
text.あんま期待されても困るけど…。: I'm troubled if you get your hopes up…
text.カッチリした服、苦手なんだよね。\r\n制服は…まだマシだけど。: I'm not a fan of tight-fitting clothes. \nUniforms… still okay.
text.大きくなったら制服買い換えないとな。\r\n…必要ないって言ったら蹴るよ？: I'll have to buy a new uniform when \nI grow up. …I'll kick you if you say \nI don't need one, okay?
text.全員同じ服って、微妙。\r\n…デカいヤツらに埋もれそうじゃん。: It's strange that everyone wears the \nsame clothes.… It feel like I'm going \nto be buried in big guys.
text.目立つのは好きじゃないけど…\r\nライブはやるよ。勝った証だし。: I don't like to show off, but… I'll do \nthe Live show. It's proof that we won.
text.勝負服…アタシだけの――\r\nって、何見てんの？笑うな…！: My own personal clothes… what are \nyou looking at? Don't laugh.
text.カワイさとか求めないでよ？\r\nこれがアタシのスタイルだし。: Don't ask me to be cute, okay? \nThis is my style.
text.…眠そうな顔。気、緩みすぎ。\r\n頭のネジ締め直してやろっか？: …You have sleepy face. You're too \nlax. Want me to re-tighten the screws \nin your head?
text.ふぁ…ねむ…。経験値3倍だから\r\nって粘りすぎた。どんどん\r\nレベル上が:
Haaah… I'm sleepy… I play too much 
because of the triple EXP. My level is 
getting higher and higher, so I don't 
know when to stop…
text.VRウマレーター、また行列…。\r\n予約もいっぱいだし。\r\n…もっと増設し: VR Umarator, queue again… And \nreservations are full… I wonder if \nthey will add more…
text.あの雲…飛行艇とか飛び出しそう。\r\nんで、それに乗って世界を救う…。\r\n:
That cloud… it looks like an airship 
or something will pop up. And save 
the world by riding on it… It's so 
cliché it feel lame.
text.ゲーム内の工房、めちゃくちゃ油\r\n臭いんだけど…なんか、妙～に\r\n嫌いに: The workshop in the game smells \nlike oil… but it's a strange smell that \nI can't get sick of.
text.あのエネミー、全然攻撃通んない！\r\nやってくれるじゃん…開発陣。\r\nくそ:
That enemy doesn't attack at all! 
You're doing great… developers. 
Damn… one more battle before I go 
to bed…!
text.毛虫が降ってくんの反則でしょ！\r\n変な声出たじゃん…！\r\nあそこでゲーム:
It's against the law to have 
caterpillars fall down! You made 
make a funny noise…! Let's not play 
games there…
text.暑いけどまだマシ。VRの工房、\r\nサウナかってくらい灼熱だから…。: It's hot, but not too hot, because \nthe VR workshop is scorching hot, \nlike a sauna…
text.蒸気機関車って、まだ走ってんだ。\r\n遠征とかで近くに寄ったら、\r\n見に行:
I didn't know steam locomotives 
were still running. If you are in the 
area on an expedition or something, 
you might want to go see it…
text.スマホのバッテリー減るの早っ。\r\n寒いとすぐこれだよ。\r\n…アタシの使い: The battery on my phone is running \ndown fast. It's like this when it's cold. \nAm I using it too much? No, but…
text.ボタンつけてとか、蹄鉄の点検\r\nしてとか…。チケットのヤツ、\r\nエンジニ: Like putting on a button or inspecting \nhorseshoes, etc… Does Ticket even \nknow what an engineer's role is?
text.ハヤヒデに誘われた対戦パズル\r\nゲーム、反応速度が鍵っぽいな。\r\n…ま、:
Hayahide invited me to play a 
competitive puzzle game, and it looks 
like reaction time is the key. Well, 
I'm not just quietly accepting my lose.
text.VRのテイオーの動き、変だった。\r\nゲームじゃ再現しきれないバネって\r\n:
Teio's movement in VR was strange. 
Does it mean that the spring can't be 
reproduced in the game? 
Is she a real strong character?
text.つ…さっきターボとぶつかって。\r\nお互いデコ打ったんだけど。身長、\r\nア: I bumped into Turbo earlier. We both \ngot hit on the forehead. I really \nthought I was taller.
text.歯車でもボーっと眺めてたいな…。\r\n規則的な動きとリズム…\r\nずーっと見: I want to stare blankly at gears… \nThe regular movement and rhythm… \nI feel like I can watch it all the time…
text.…ん、なに？なんか言った？\r\n耳カバーにイヤホン入れてるから、\r\n聞き取: …hmm, what? What did you say? \nI have earphones in my ear covers, \nso it's hard for me to hear you.
text.目はいいから、モノクルは度なし。\r\n暗いところじゃゲームやんないし、\r\n: I have good eyesight, so I don't wear \na monocle. I don't play games in the \ndark. That's how much care I take.
text.今日の朝もや…なんかいつもと\r\n違う世界に迷い込んだみたいな…。\r\n…っ:
This morning… I feel like I've 
wandered into a different world than 
usual… I've been playing too many 
games…
text.あー、ハヤヒデの小言長かった。\r\nごはん中にゲームしただけじゃん。\r\n次:
Ah, Hayahide's scolding was long. 
I just played a game during dinner. 
Next time, I will try to make sure she 
doesn't find out.
text.あぶなっ…アプリのログボ、\r\n忘れるとこだった。これ逃すと\r\n装備の強化: Oh no… I almost forgot about the \napp log-in. If I miss this, I'll be late \nfor the equipment enhancement…
text.いい感じに暖かくなってきた…。\r\nたまには散歩がてら公園行って…\r\nゲー: It's getting nice and warm… \nSometimes I go to the park for a walk \n… and play games.
text.ゲームのCM、水着ばっかじゃん。\r\nなんだろ…これで夏を感じる\r\n自分が: All the game commercials are full of \nswimsuits. What is it… I hate myself \nfor feeling summer with this.
text.VRで遊んだゲームの住人、\r\n蒸気で焼き芋蒸かしてたっけ。\r\nふ…変な世: I remember a game resident I played \nin VR steamed a baked potato with \nsteam. Hmmm… weird world.
text.寒っ。ウマレーター起動しよ…。\r\nゲーム内で暖まれんの便利すぎ。\r\n遊べ:
It's cold. Let's start up Umarator… 
It's too convenient to warm up in the 
game. You can play and kill two birds 
with one stone.
text.まずは慣らし運転。\r\nそっから徐々にペースあげてく。: First, we will break in. \nThen gradually increase the pace.
text.アンタの基準でいいから、\r\n点数つけて。そっちのが燃える。: Just give me a score based on your \ncriteria. That's more exciting.
text.早くやるよ。\r\nとっくに温まってるから。: I'll do it quickly. \nI'm already warmed up.
text.トライアル＆エラーとか、\r\n生ぬるいこと言わないでよ。\r\n最初から全力だ: Don't say something ikewarm like trial \nand error. I'm going to give it my all \nright from the start…!
text.一緒にやるのは構わない。\r\nけど、足引っ張ったら承知しない。: I don't mind if we work together. But \nif you drag me down, I won't accept it.
text.あんま出しゃばんないよね。\r\n…自分の役割、わかってるじゃん。: You don't get involved too much, do \nyou? You know your role.
text.アンタ、根っからの\r\n強化役【バッファー】だよね。\r\n…バックアップ、し: You're a [buffer] aren't you?… \nBackup, don't screw it up okay.
text.サポートありがと…悪くなかった。: Thanks for the support… \nit wasn't bad.
text.まだまだ。次はもっと高みに行く。: Not quite there yet. Next time we will \ngo higher.
text.ナリタタイシン。\r\nアンタが助手？…あっそ。: Narita Taishin. Are you my assistant? \nOh, well.
text.CM撮影…またあるかな。: CM shooting… \nwill there be another one?
text.ボロボロに壊れても…\r\n何度だって直してみせる！: Even if it breaks into pieces… \nI'll fix it again and again!
text.誰も届かない…高みへ…！: To heights no one else can reach…!
text.…アタシには無理？諦めろ？舐めんな！\r\n全員まとめて…振り切ってやる…！: …I can't do it? Give up? Don't \nunderestimate me! put them all \ntogether… and shake them off…!
text.どうだ、見たか…アタシのチューニング！: Well, Did you see it… my tuning!
text.さむっ…。チケットの言うこと、\r\n聞かなくてよかった。凍った湖に\r\nテン: It's so cold… I'm glad I didn't listen \nto Ticket. Building a tent on a frozen \nlake, she is too stupid…
text.はぁ…喋りすぎた。疲れた…。\r\n…ずっとうるさくできるのも、\r\nある意味: Huh… I talked too much. I'm tired… \n… Maybe it's a talent, in a way, to be \nso loud all the time…
text.…CMのこと、母さんに内緒に\r\nしてたのに…メッセきたし。\r\nチケットの: I didn't tell my mom about the CM \nthing… but I got a message. Damn \nyou Ticket…!
text.機械修理の操作画面って、\r\nパズルゲームなんだ。\r\n…割とやってるから、: The machine repair operation screen \nis a puzzle game. …I've been doing \nit a lot, so I'm getting by.
text.…過去の自分のレース、\r\n見返してみようかな…。\r\nまあ、たまには…。: …Maybe I should look back at my \npast races… Well, once in a while…
text.チビだってナメてたら、\r\n後悔するから。: If you underestimate me just because \nI'm small, you'll regret it.
text.まだまだ！\r\nアンタなんかに負けないし。: I'm not done yet! \nI'm not going to lose to you.
